subject: BUG: RA cannot change event owner + update failing silently
body:
Fulton,

El Gotan tried to update event 6853312aa1e3cfb6f8bba992 as RA:
- Change owner
- Set granted organizer
- Remove alternate

Two issues found:

## Issue 1: ownerOrganizerID blocked

EventsRA.js line 213:
```javascript
delete updateData.ownerOrganizerID;  // Explicitly blocked!
```

RAs CANNOT change event owner. Is this intentional? El Gotan expected to be able to reassign ownership.

## Issue 2: Update failed silently

Event was NOT updated at all:
- updatedAt still June 2025
- No lastModifiedByRA audit trail
- grantedOrganizerID and alternateOrganizerID also didn't update

Possible causes:
1. checkRAPermission failed (masteredCityId mismatch?)
2. Error thrown but not returned to FE
3. JSON parse issue

Event details:
- ID: 6853312aa1e3cfb6f8bba992
- Title: Milonga Poema
- Owner: ObjectId('680669192f926881302124bb') (organizer 'Unknown/UNKNOWN')

## Questions

1. Should RAs be able to change ownerOrganizerID?
2. Why did the update fail completely?

â€” Sarah
